name: Supay
description:
The game is about a village invaded by Supay, a deity who loves to be worshiped and if he doesn't have enough followers, he will unleash his evil minions. This is when the players, as guardians of the place, try to save the people. So its main mechanics would be killing small demons and taking care of villagers, who will be running and screaming and you will have to catch and carry them safely to their homes or to the Altar of Faith, a place for them to pray to the god so he will be content. In the village, you can find the Magic Stone situated in the lowest part, this will help you increase population but will also make the minions powerful, so you have to stop them getting there at all cost. 



The game is an adventure two-player tower defense with shoot'em up and it’s cooperative with a hint of competitive which players will discover during the match. The difficulty will increase as time passes and Supay requires more subjects to be calm, and in order to finish the game, you have to fill all the houses while you protect your population from the evil minions and have people praying,  then you will have to enter through the monsters door to conquer your destiny.
